text: Chiwapa is an unincorporated community in Pontotoc County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== The community takes its name from Chiwapa Creek, which flows near the town site. A variant name is "Chiwappa". A post office called Chiwapa was established in 1883, and remained in operation until 1906. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Pontotoc County, Mississippi
title: Chiwapa, Mississippi
